question:
What is shorter when it's older 
 and taller when it's younger?  
 (P6A 16 TSE ALISSA)

They are twin sisters, the same height and the same weight. 
 They work in the kitchen arm-in-arm. Whatever is cooked, they always try it first. 
(P6A 17 UMER ANAYAH)

A rooster climbed up on to  the barn and laid an egg. 
 Which side did it fall? 
(P6A 1 AHMED MUJTABA ZAK)
answer: It didn't fall anywhere. There was no egg because a rooster can't lay eggs.

question:
I light up the night with a bright glow,  
 hung everywhere even on people's doors. 
 (P6E 7 LOUISGRAND ANG ADELLE MIREILLE)

What is fragile that if you say my name, you break me.  
 What am I? 
(P6B 13 OKAWARA KARIN)

I'm filled with hope and dreams as I rise high, 
 with a flickering light and a colorful sky. 
 Children release me, what a beautiful sight. What am I, illuminating the night? 
(P6B 9 MITTAL ADVIKA)

I have cities, but no houses.  
 I have mountains, but no trees. I have water but no fish. What am I? 
(P6D 12 SAW-MYINT-OO HTAT AUNG)

What goes down but never up? 
(P6B 18 WU MAN CHUN)
